name: Final Fantasy Explorers Collector's Edition
summary:
"The world is at war over the greatest source of power in the world, the Grand Crystal. Players must band together to form an elite squad of Explorers, who venture out to collect pieces of the Grand Crystal to provide energy for the planet while fighting off hordes of monsters." 
 
Special Edition Features: 
 
Final Fantasy Explorers game 
 
Songs for the Journey – a sample CD that contains 20 tracks from the FF Explorers OST 
 
Limited edition artwork box (featuring art from FF artist Yoshitaka Amano) 
 
FF Explorers Collector’s hard case for your Nintendo 3DS console 
 
40 page Limited edition art book 
 
Four unlockable in game quests for legendary weapons
